resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106366</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106366</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Moving Man</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Bewegliche Mann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Homme Mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Homem Movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Uomo Commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κινούμενο άτομο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Hombre Móvil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn about position, velocity, and acceleration graphs. Move the little man back and forth with the mouse and plot his motion. Set the position, velocity, or acceleration and let the simulation move the man for you.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie über Position, Geschwindigkeit und 
Beschleunigung Diagramme. Verschieben Sie den kleinen Mann hin 
und her mit der Maus und plotten Sie seine Bewegung. Stellen Sie
die Position, die Geschwindigkeit oder die Beschleunigung ein und 
lassen Sie die Simulation Bewegung der Mann für Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renseignez-vous sur la position, la vitesse, et 
les graphiques d'accélération. Déplacez le petit homme dans 
les deux sens avec la souris et tracez son mouvement. Placez la 
position, la vitesse, ou l'accélération et laissez le mouvement de 
simulation l'homme pour vous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda sobre a posição, a velocidade, e os 
gráficos do acceleration. Mova o homem pequeno para a frente e 
para trás com o rato e trace seu movimento. Ajuste a posição,
a velocidade, ou o acceleration e deixe o movimento da simulação o 
homem para você.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari circa la posizione, la velocità ed i 
grafici di accelerazione. Sposti avanti e indietro l'uomo 
piccolo con il mouse e tracci il suo movimento. Regoli la 
posizione, la velocità, o l'accelerazione e lasci il movimento di 
simulazione l'uomo per voi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε για τη θέση, την ταχύτητα, και τις γραφικές 
παραστάσεις ταχύτητας. Κινήστε το μικρό άτομο πέρα δώθε 
με το ποντίκι και σχεδιάστε την κίνησή του. Θέστε τη θέση,
την ταχύτητα, ή την ταχύτητα και αφήστε την κίνηση προσομοίωσης 
το άτομο για σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda sobre la posición, la velocidad, y 
gráficos de la aceleración. Mueva a pequeño hombre hacia 
adelante y hacia atrás con el ratón y trace su movimiento. 
Fije la posición, la velocidad, o la aceleración y deje el 
movimiento de la simulación el hombre para usted.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106366</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-moving-man</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
